00080         class Address {
00081          public:
00083             Address(const string& inHostPort);
00084             
00086             explicit Address(unsigned int inPort=0, const string& inHost="localhost") : mPortNumber(inPort) {lookupHost(inHost);}
00087             
00089             const string& getHostName() const {return mHostName;}
00091             const string& getIPAddress() const {return mIPAddress;}
